channel.title: CVE Feed for AccessPress Themes -- all

item.title: CVE-2022-23975|2024-09-16T20:32:39.469Z -- accesspress%20themes -- access%20demo%20importer%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) in Access Demo Importer <= 1.0.7 on WordPress allows an attacker to activate any installed plugin.
